title: Scientific Explanations in Earthquake Education: Enhancing Understanding Through Modeling Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Targeting practicing elementary school teachers, aims to enhance earthquake education competencies within social contexts

learning_goals: Learners can causally explain earthquake causes by linking them to geoscientific mechanisms (e.g., plate tectonics)
Learners enhance conceptualization skills by transitioning from static to dynamic models of earthquake phenomena
Learners can propose earthquake prevention and citizen-level response strategies based on scientific evidence
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
